Through original programming, documentaries, and expert-led discussions, MHTN aims to increase awareness, provide valuable information, and encourage open conversations about mental well-being.

programme.title: Quo Vadis TV
programme.desc: Quo Vadis TV is committed to sharing the Biblical message in a way that makes Christian living practical, realistic, and attainable. Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: DW News goes deep beneath the surface, providing the key stories from Europe and around the world.

programme.title: Eco Africa The Environment Magazine
programme.desc: Deutsche Welle's Eco Africa showcases innovative concepts and best practice projects from Africa and Europe and presents environment and climate change ideas that inspire others to get on board or start something of their own. Eco Africa offers insight and moves people to help protect the environment.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: DW News goes deep beneath the surface, providing the key stories from Europe and around the world.

programme.title: Letters from a Chechen Prison - Zarema and Her Rebel Family
programme.desc: The story of Zarema, kidnapped and imprisoned in Chechnya for defending human rights. Nine years in a penal colony: That is the sentence Zarema Musayeva has to serve because her sons rebelled against Chechen ruler Ramzan Kadyrov. Zarema’s family is doing everything they can to ensure she is not forgotten.

programme.title: By Train Through Thailand's West

programme.title: Decoding Conflicts - Transnistria - A Powder Keg in Eastern Europe
programme.desc: Officially, Transnistria is part of the Republic of Moldova. But in practice, it is a state within a state. After the collapse of the Soviet Union, the region seceded in a bloody civil war. It has its own flag, currency and government.

programme.title: The 77 Percent The Magazine for Africa's Youth
programme.desc: We meet Buumba Malambo, one of Zambia's youngest politicians who is on a mission to change attitudes. We speak with young people in Cape Town about why they no longer vote. Musical worlds collide at the Beethovenfest and the Dream Catchers Dance Academy in Lagos helps young children stay off the street. Plus, we discover Libreville through the eyes of artist Corail King.

programme.desc: Secluded deep in the Bavarian Alps, Hitler, his family, and closest allies hid away, issuing orders for armies across Europe while they relaxed, dined, and enjoyed an otherworldly peace.

programme.title: Hitler's Gold
programme.desc: Germany, 1937. Hitler appears to be fulfilling his promise of returning Germany to prosperity - but there was a deeply sinister side to the recovery.

programme.title: Beyond Watergate: The Richard Nixon Story
programme.desc: Explore the enigmatic life of Richard Nixon, from his rise to power as the 37th U.S. president to the infamous Watergate scandal.

programme.title: Hitler: Empire of Evil
programme.desc: A war documentary about how Adolf Hitlers' dissolution of a non-aggression pact with Josef Stalin became an error he'd never recover from.

programme.title: Hitler's Gold
programme.desc: Who financed Hitler and helped him to achieve power? Here, follow the trail of money to the top and see the secret partnerships that underpinned the evil regime.

programme.title: Presidents and UFOs: The Surprising Story
programme.desc: A history of UFO's and Presidents, from George Washington to Donald Trump, with expert testimony, interviews, and reports of personal encounters involving U.S. Presidents and unexplained paranormal phenomena.

programme.title: Who Killed JFK? The Conspiracies
programme.desc: Look back on the moment that changed the course of world history, questioning the official record. Was the assassination a conspiracy?

programme.title: Wardens: Michigan
programme.desc: Officers on the west side of southern Michigan check on waterfowl hunters and wardens on the east side check on overnight walleye anglers.

programme.title: Wardens: Michigan

programme.title: Biblical Prophecy: The End Times

programme.title: A Savage Life: The Bronx to Big Time

programme.title: Destruction Decoded

programme.title: Idea Generation
programme.desc: Innovative individuals in creative entrepreneurship discuss how great ideas come to life, explaining how they execute and operationalize big ideas.

programme.title: The David Rubenstein Show: Peer to Peer Conversations
programme.desc: Financier and philanthropist David Rubenstein talks with his peers - leaders of some of America's biggest companies - in this interview show that aims to answer the question of what makes a great leader; Rubenstein uses his chats to explore successful leadership skills through the personal and professional choices made by the business world's most influential people; Rubenstein travels across the country to find out about the business leaders' stories and uncover information about their paths to success; the interview subjects include Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates, Berkshire Hathaway chairman Warren Buffett and Pepsi CEO Indra Nooyi.

programme.title: Power Players
programme.desc: Sports personalities share their perspectives and discuss various subjects like the ever-evolving world of business, diversity in elite competitions and the rise of eSports.

programme.title: Perfect 1oz Rarity
programme.desc: This is the last chance to add a 2024 High Relief 1oz Palladium American Eagle graded perfect Proof 70UCAM to your collection. Struck from .9995 fine Palladium and a miniscule mintage of 7500 this rarity features Adolph Weinman designs on both sides.

programme.title: Historic Gold Set
programme.desc: Enhance your numismatic collection with the Set of 2 1927-P and 1928-P Saint Gaudens Gold Double Eagles in Gem Mint State 65 condition today. Each example has an MS65 population less than 2% of their mintages, making these amazing condition rarities!

programme.title: Best of the Qatar Economic Forum, Powered by Bloomberg
programme.desc: Bringing together some of the world's most influential financial and economic thinkers, policy makers and business leaders to prepare a blueprint for the next stage of global growth.

programme.title: Nancy Goudie - Lessons From Mary
programme.desc: A diverse schedule of international Christian programming with a bold, modern focus.

programme.title: GOD TV Together Podcast
programme.desc: Guests discuss contemporary issues from a religious perspective, emphasising the importance of seeking the blessings of the Almighty.

programme.title: Jesus Conference
programme.desc: Bringing you different styles of worship and ministry from all over the world as part of our ongoing coverage of top conferences.

programme.title: Jesus Conference
programme.desc: Bringing you different styles of worship and ministry from all over the world as part of our ongoing coverage of top conferences.

programme.title: Go Deeper - The Lord's Prayer
programme.desc: Bishop Mark Chrionna goes deeper into the Word of God to discuss The Lord's Prayer, scripture that many non-Christians are aware of, and its foundational nature in the journey of Faith.

programme.title: God tv 30th anniversary
programme.desc: Join Fergus and Mel to celebrate 30 years. Learn how you can partner with us in sharing the Gospel message, worldwide, through Media.

programme.title: Growing Together
programme.desc: GOD TV partners with ministries and preachers worldwide. Join us for this series looking at some of the short messages and Words of Inspiration, Hope, Faith and Encouragement that they have shared.

programme.title: Family Time: Angus Buchan
programme.desc: Five minutes of practical insights to help build stronger homes, from South African Evangelist and nation builder Angus Buchan of Shalom Ministries.

programme.title: Crown Jesus Ministries
programme.desc: Crown Jesus Ministries present this short series of inspirational programming.

programme.title: God Conversations: Tania Harris
programme.desc: Tania Harris takes a moment in order to talk the viewer through how to have God Conversations: not just in prayer talking to Him, but also how to listen to what He might be saying back.

programme.title: God tv 30th anniversary
programme.desc: Join Fergus and Mel to celebrate 30 years. Learn how you can partner with us in sharing the Gospel message, worldwide, through Media.

programme.title: Victory Today - Sam Luke
programme.desc: Victory Tabernacle is dedicated to proclaiming the gospel of Jesus Christ, empowered by the Spirit of Pentecost, with vision rooted in comprehension of God's divine purpose for His church. Pastor Sam Luke offers a religious discourse.

programme.title: Creflo Dollar
programme.desc: Dr. Creflo Dollar ministers to all walks of life with hope for change. With a renewal of faith, mind, and spirit, He and his wife Taffi share their vision for all to understand God's love and promises.

programme.title: Jentzen Franklin
programme.desc: Pastor and New York Times best-selling author, Jentzen Franklin of Free Chapel Worship Centre in Georgia aims to help people encounter God through inspired worship and relevant Bible teaching.

programme.title: David Jeremiah
programme.desc: Dr David Jeremiah of Turning Point Broadcast Ministries and Shadow Mountain Church has a passion for people and a clear mission: delivering the unchanging Word of God to an ever-changing world.

programme.title: In Touch: Charles Stanley
programme.desc: The late pastor of First Baptist Church, Atlanta, Charles Stanley shares how to apply Biblical principles to daily life, drawing from his vast wealth of experience in a ministry that spans many years.

programme.title: John Ankerberg Show
programme.desc: The founder of the Ankerberg Theological Research Institute, John Ankerberg is a leading Christian apologetics expert. He and his guests examine current issues and provide balanced, Biblical answers.

programme.title: God tv 30th anniversary
programme.desc: Join Fergus and Mel to celebrate 30 years. Learn how you can partner with us in sharing the Gospel message, worldwide, through Media.

programme.title: God tv 30th anniversary
programme.desc: Join Fergus and Mel to celebrate 30 years. Learn how you can partner with us in sharing the Gospel message, worldwide, through Media.

programme.title: John Kilpatrick Ministries
programme.desc: Making church more accessible to viewers, bringing encouragement and prayer support into their homes and timely messages from John Kilpatrick who is known worldwide for the Brownsville Revival.

programme.title: James River TV
programme.desc: Led by John and Debbie Lindell, James River Church in Ozark, Missouri, loves to welcome people into God's family, with the firm belief that there is no limit to what God can do in people's lives.

programme.title: CFAN - Daniel Kolenda
programme.desc: For more than 40 years, Christ for all Nations (CfaN), led by Reinhard Bonnke and Daniel Kolenda, has held mass crusades worldwide resulting in over 75 million people deciding to follow Jesus Christ.

programme.title: In Touch: Charles Stanley
programme.desc: The late pastor of First Baptist Church, Atlanta, Charles Stanley shares how to apply Biblical principles to daily life, drawing from his vast wealth of experience in a ministry that spans many years.

programme.title: Jewish Voice with Jonathan Bernis
programme.desc: Rabbi Jonathan Bernis of Jewish Voice Ministries shares the lessons he learned after his miraculous health recovery.

programme.title: Love Israel with Baruch Korman PH.D
programme.desc: Known on Israeli TV for his messages in Hebrew, Dr Baruch Korman of the Zera Avraham Institute presents biblically-based teachings with an emphasis on the Jewish context of scripture.

programme.title: Portions Podcast
programme.desc: Join Jonathan Bernis and a host of guests, journeying through Scripture from a Jewish perspective and meeting God along the way.

programme.title: CITY TV
programme.desc: Evangelist and author Daniel Norris is a true son of revival, continuing in the footsteps of his mentor Steve Hill, to bring the message of revival and repentance to the nations.

programme.title: Counsel Culture With Bishop O'Neal
programme.desc: Bishop Jarron O'Neal of The Fountain Church International gives all glory to God, to be a part of spreading the Gospel to the ends of the Earth.

programme.title: Hagee Ministries
programme.desc: Pastors John and Matt Hagee of Hagee Ministries in San Antonio, TX, deliver messages from God's Word, proclaiming the bold truth of His promises.

programme.title: Victory Today - Sam Luke
programme.desc: Victory Tabernacle is dedicated to proclaiming the gospel of Jesus Christ, empowered by the Spirit of Pentecost, with vision rooted in comprehension of God's divine purpose for His church. Pastor Sam Luke offers a religious discourse.

programme.title: Allen Jackson Ministries
programme.desc: Pastor Allen Jackson brings a Biblical perspective to the ever-changing world, encouraging believers to lead with their faith in every arena - no matter what shaking the season may bring.

programme.title: John Kilpatrick Ministries
programme.desc: Making church more accessible to viewers, bringing encouragement and prayer support into their homes and timely messages from John Kilpatrick who is known worldwide for the Brownsville Revival.

programme.title: Mark Chironna

programme.title: Caleb Wampler
programme.desc: Caleb Wampler's ministry vision is to help people meet Jesus and live empowered for His Kingdom.

programme.title: $1.6M Meltwater Champions Chess Tour
programme.desc: World Chess Champion Magnus Carlsen and 15 more elite players compete in the Goldmoney Asian Rapid.

programme.title: Bringing Up Baby
programme.desc: Harried paleontologist David Huxley (Cary Grant) has to make a good impression on society matron Mrs. Random (May Robson), who is considering donating one million dollars to his museum. On the day before his wedding, Huxley meets Mrs. Random's high-spirited young niece, Susan Vance (Katharine Hepburn), a madcap adventuress who immediately falls for the straitlaced scientist. The ever-growing chaos -- including a missing dinosaur bone and a pet leopard -- threatens to swallow him whole.

programme.title: Beat the Devil
programme.desc: Billy and Maria Dannreuther are among a number of travelers stranded in Italy en route to Africa. While the Dannreuthers seem like an average couple, they have the same goal as Mrs. Gwendolen Chelm and some of their other shifty companions -- to lay claim to property that is supposedly rich with uranium.

programme.title: So Ends Our Night
programme.desc: In Austria, German Ludwig Kern (Glenn Ford) is stripped of his passport and jailed for 40 days when he admits he is a Jew. Befriended by German political dissident Josef Steiner (Fredric March), the men travel to Czechoslovakia together upon their release. As the German army closes in on first Czechoslovakia, then Austria and ultimately France as war begins, Ludwig, Josef and fellow refugee Ruth Holland (Margaret Sullavan), without passports, desperately try to keep one step ahead of them.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: After being abducted by Magua (Bruce Cabot), the Native American scout sent to escort them to Fort William Henry, sisters Cora (Heather Angel) and Alice Munro (Binnie Barnes) are rescued by two Mohicans -- Uncas (Philip Reed) and his father, Chingachgook (Robert Barrat) -- and their companion, Hawkeye (Randolph Scott). Cora falls for Uncas, and Alice for Hawkeye, and the two men struggle to protect their newfound lady loves in the midst of escalating violence during the French and Indian War.

programme.title: Through the Bible With Les Feldick
programme.desc: Les Feldick was an Oklahoma farmer and rancher with a special gift for teaching the Bible. His simple and nondenominational approach on the program "Through the Bible with Les Feldick" has reached millions around the world with the Gospel of Grace.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: With Earp and Bassett out of town, George Morris' gang sacks Dodge City and rounds up all of the remaining deputies except for Bat, who finds Earp and sneaks back into town to fight the gang with the help of local residents.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: A down-at-the-heels pawnbroker is offered a large sum for copying the encyclopedia for four hours a day.

programme.title: The Big Combo
programme.desc: Film noir about a police lieutenant who comes under pressure from a gang headed by a vicious thug. He is helped by the gangster's wife, jealous at her husband's affair with another woman, who supplies him with information to help him close the net on his foe.

programme.title: Suddenly
programme.desc: In advance of a presidential visit to the small town of Suddenly, California, a trio of FBI agents enters the Benson family's home to assess potential security risks. Once inside, leader John Baron (Frank Sinatra) reveals himself as a psychopathic assassin, and he kidnaps the family in order to use their house as his vantage point in his plot to kill the president. Sheriff Tod Shaw (Sterling Hayden) matches wits with the assassin and his gang in an attempt to save the day.

programme.title: Outlaw Women
programme.desc: A gambling queen (Marie Windsor) and her henchwomen run things until a U.S. marshal (Richard Rober) comes to town.

programme.title: Little Big Horn
programme.desc: Captain Phillip Donlin (Lloyd Bridges) and his small troop must rush to reach Little Big Horn in order to warn General Custer of the Sioux attack that awaits him. As they race against time, and Donlin pushes them hard through an arduous and dangerous journey, the Sioux start taking out the soldiers one at a time. Meanwhile, Donlin also clashes with Lt. John Haywood (John Ireland), who Donlin knows is having an affair with his wife, Celie (Marie Windsor).

programme.title: The Man From Tumbleweeds
programme.desc: Ex-convict gunfighters join a state ranger (Bill Elliott) on patrol for outlaws.

programme.title: Lonesome Dove
programme.desc: Two former Texas Rangers renew their spirit of adventure as they and other residents of a Texas town join a cattle drive to the Montana Territory.

programme.title: The Blue Dahlia
programme.desc: A war veteran mixes it up with gangsters and gun molls while searching for the man who murdered his unfaithful wife.

programme.title: Walk East on Beacon
programme.desc: An FBI agent (George Murphy) works with a refugee scientist (Finlay Currie) and the Coast Guard to crack a Soviet spy ring in Boston.

programme.title: To the Ends of the Earth
programme.desc: A U.S. narcotics agent (Dick Powell) tracks an opium cartel out to rule the world.

programme.desc: A businessman (Richard Conte) tries to warn his gangster brothers about a syndicate plot to kill them.

programme.title: Cash on Demand
programme.desc: A British banker (Peter Cushing) pretends to cooperate with a would-be robber (Andre Morell) holding his wife and son.

programme.title: The Garment Jungle
programme.desc: New York garment factory owner Walter Mitchell (Lee J. Cobb) goes the extra, deceitful mile in battling his employees' efforts to unionize. He hires gangster Artie Ravage (Richard Boone) to interfere with the grassroots efforts. After Mitchell's son, Alan (Kerwin Matthews), returns from Europe and befriends one of the union organizers (Robert Loggia), Mitchell eventually tries to mend his unethical ways. Unfortunately, this does not sit well with the violent, vengeful Ravage.

programme.title: The 39 Steps
programme.desc: While on vacation in London, Canadian Richard Hannay (Robert Donat) becomes embroiled in an international spy ring related to the mysterious "39 steps." Then he meets agent Annabella Smith (Lucie Mannheim), who is soon killed in his apartment. He must elude the police, who are hunting him for murder, while he tries to stop Professor Jordan (Godfrey Tearle) from sending secrets out of the country. Hannay is assisted by Pamela (Madeleine Carroll), an unwilling accomplice who discovers the truth.

programme.title: The Fatal Mallet
programme.desc: Three men play dirty tricks to charm a beautiful young woman.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid in Old New Mexico
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid (Duncan Renaldo) and Pancho (Martin Garralaga) free a girl (Gwen Kenyon) accused of murder, then find the killer.

programme.title: Law of the Canyon
programme.desc: The Durango Kid (Charles Starrett) and his sidekick (Smiley Burnette) bust a frontier protection racket.

programme.title: The Return of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Watson finds Holmes still alive three years after his reported death at Moriarty's hands.

programme.title: The Brothers Rico
programme.desc: Former Mafia bookkeeper Eddie Rico (Richard Conte) has decided to go straight and lives with his wife in Florida, where they plan to adopt a child. However, his brothers, Johnny (James Darren) and Gino (Paul Picerni), still work for his ex-boss, Sid Kubik (Larry Gates) -- and, when Eddie finds out their lives are in danger, he tries to re-establish his connection to the world he thought he had left behind. But when one of his brothers is killed, Eddie realizes that he may be next.

programme.title: Lonesome Dove
programme.desc: Jake's (Robert Urich) involvement with the Suggs gang reaches a tragic climax; Gus reunites with an old flame (Anjelica Houston).

programme.title: Sirocco
programme.desc: American Harry Smith (Humphrey Bogart) is selling guns to Emir Hassan (Onslow Stevens), whose Syrian rebels are battling occupying French troops. Hoping to stem the fighting, French Col. Feroud (Lee J. Cobb) asks Harry to introduce him to Hassan. Meanwhile, Feroud's girlfriend, Violette (Märta Torén), is increasingly drawn to Harry. While she wants Harry to ferry her out of the dangerous country, he boldly tries to make a profit from his dealings with both Hassan and Feroud.

programme.title: Framed
programme.desc: Truck driver Mike Lambert (Glenn Ford) is a down-and-out mining engineer searching for a job. When his rig breaks down in a small town, he happens upon Paula Craig (Janis Carter), a venomous seductress. When Craig's boyfriend, Steve Price (Barry Sullivan), robs a bank, they intend to frame Lambert, but Craig murders Price, takes the money and convinces Lambert that he killed Price in a blackout. Lambert is ready to skip town, until he learns a friend is set to take the fall.

programme.title: The Night Holds Terror
programme.desc: Three hitchhikers hold a factory worker (Jack Kelly) and his family for ransom after they determine his father is very wealthy.

programme.title: The Snows of Kilimanjaro
programme.desc: The life of celebrated American writer Harry Street (Gregory Peck) flashes back before his eyes as he lies dying from a wound suffered at the foot of Tanzania's Mount Kilimanjaro. As he is tended to by his traveling companion, Helen (Susan Hayward), he recalls many things: his first wife and Paris literary inspiration, Cynthia Green (Ava Gardner) ; his second wife, Countess Liz (Hildegarde Neff) ; and his formative years with uncle Bill (Leo G. Carroll).

programme.title: Cattle Queen of Montana
programme.desc: When defiant female rancher Sierra Nevada Jones (Barbara Stanwyck) sweeps into Montana, she receives a hostile welcome from a tribe of Native Americans who attack her cattle and leave her father dead. Kindly Indian brave Colorados (Lance Fuller) and government officer Farrell (Ronald Reagan) help Sierra fight for her land against treacherous locals like the envious Tom McCord (Gene Evans), a neighboring rancher determined to cheat Jones out of her property and drive her back to Texas.

programme.desc: Watch the latest international top stories every 30 minutes with the emphasis on debate, dialogue, role of cultural differences and analytics of key events.

programme.title: Revisited
programme.desc: Revisited heads to different parts of the world several years after they have been affected by significant events or disasters to examine what the current situation is there today.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: Watch the latest international top stories every 30 minutes with the emphasis on debate, dialogue, role of cultural differences and analytics of key events.

programme.title: A Week in France
programme.desc: The latest news from the world of art and culture.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Payroll
programme.desc: (1961) British crime thriller starring Billie Whitelaw. When Jackie's husband - an armoured van driver - is killed in a heist, she vows to unmask those responsible and take her revenge.

programme.title: Three Hours to Kill
programme.desc: (1954) Western starring Dana Andrews. A man falsely accused of murder gets a last-minute reprieve from the lynch mob so he can track down the real culprit.

programme.title: Rio Grande
programme.desc: (1950) Western. John Wayne plays the commander of a Texan fort at which his ex-wife (Maureen O'Hara) pitches up. Can he win back her love by saving kidnapped children from Apache raiders?

programme.title: Ten Tall Men
programme.desc: (1951) Comedy adventure. Burt Lancaster stars as a Foreign Legion sergeant leading nine men on a dangerous mission to prevent a Berber attack on a North African desert fort.

programme.title: Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: (2004) Drama. Dennis Quaid stars as the captain of an aircraft downed in the desert. There's no hope of rescue, unless he and the survivors can build another plane from the wreckage.

programme.title: Deadpool 2
programme.desc: (2018) Ryan Reynolds returns as the potty-mouthed, can of whup-ass-opening superhero and now he's got buddies to help him take on baddie Josh Brolin in the all-out action comedy sequel.

programme.title: Venom
programme.desc: (2018) Dark sci-fi action with Tom Hardy as Marvel's anti-hero. A reporter becomes inhabited by a ferocious extraterrestrial that has its own ideas on how to behave. With Michelle Williams.

programme.title: The Outsiders
programme.desc: (1983) Francis Ford Coppola's seminal brat pack coming-of-age crime drama with Tom Cruise, Patrick Swayze, Ralph Macchio, Matt Dillon and Rob Lowe. Two teenage tribes go to war in Tulsa.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Pool of London
programme.desc: (1951) Bonar Colleano stars in this thriller, as a sailor who police think's a killer. Has he been set up? He goes on the run. Will police find him? Are his days done? #NationalPoetryDay

programme.title: Nothing But the Best
programme.desc: (1964) British comedy with Denholm Elliott and Alan Bates. Jimmy hopes to change when he and Charles become mates, as Charles teaches him how to be one of the greats. #NationalPoetryDay

programme.title: The Wrong Box
programme.desc: (1966) Comedy with a stellar cast. With dosh going to the one who dies last. Who will get the cash? As both brothers clash. Wanting their parents' money fast. #NationalPoetryDay

programme.title: The Frogmen
programme.desc: (1951) Richard Widmark stars as a frogman, whose team really aren't this frogman's fan. But when a torpedo hits the sick bay, can frogman Richard save the day? #NationalPoetryDay

programme.title: Dante's Peak
programme.desc: (1997) Volcanologist Pierce Brosnan warns a town of a coming eruption. But the locals won't evacuate; they don't want the disruption. #NationalPoetryDay

programme.title: See How They Run
programme.desc: (2022) Comic whodunnit set amid a play. A director's been killed and the body's going stiff. Can two cops solve it? With Sam Rockwell, Saoirse Ronan and Reece Shearsmith. #NationalPoetryDay

programme.title: Knives Out
programme.desc: (2019) Quirky whodunnit with Daniel Craig as Benoit Blanc, an eccentric detective. A rich man's been killed and everyone has a motive, so Benoit must be extra perceptive. #NationalPoetryDay

programme.title: Hyde Park on Hudson
programme.desc: (2012) Fact-based drama. It's 1939 and King George VI (Samuel West) and Queen Elizabeth (Olivia Colman) visit president FD Roosevelt (Bill Murray) to secure help against the Nazis.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Black Arrow
programme.desc: (1948) Historical adventure. A man (Louis Hayward) returns from the Wars of the Roses to learn from his uncle that a family friend has killed his father. But is everything as it seems?

programme.title: Gift Horse
programme.desc: (1952) War drama. Trevor Howard plays the captain of an ageing US warship, gifted to the British navy, which is chosen to lead the raid on Saint-Nazaire in 1942. With Richard Attenborough.

programme.title: Young Winston
programme.desc: (1972) Biopic charting the rise of the future PM from battered Harrow pupil to MP via military action on foreign soil. Directed by Richard Attenborough.

programme.title: The Moonraker
programme.desc: (1958) Romantic thriller. George Baker stars as a heroic Cavalier horseman, beating off the Roundhead foe as he single-handedly smuggles the country's aristocracy to safety in France.

programme.title: Daddy's Home
programme.desc: (2015) Comedy starring Mark Wahlberg, Will Ferrell and Linda Cardellini. A man's living happily with his wife and stepchildren - until the kids' biological dad swaggers back onto the scene.

programme.title: Plane
programme.desc: (2023) Action thriller starring Gerard Butler as an airline pilot who must become a one-man army after crashlanding on an island overrun by bad guys. To survive, he's gonna have to wing it.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
programme.desc: (2019) Quentin Tarantino's darkly comic drama set in 60s LA, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Brad Pitt and Margot Robbie. A failing actor's world collides with the Manson Family.

programme.title: Slow West
programme.desc: (2015) Violent offbeat western starring Kodi Smit-McPhee and Michael Fassbender. A 16-year-old Scottish lad travels to 1870s Colorado on the trail of his true love.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: A Christmas Carol
programme.desc: (1984) George C Scott stars in Clive Donner's adaptation of Charles Dickens' classic festive fantasy. The miserly curmudgeon Ebenezer Scrooge is visited by three ghosts of Christmas.

programme.title: Dragonball Evolution
programme.desc: (2009) Martial arts adventure. Justin Chatwin stars as the leader of a mystical band of warriors who are out to save the world from the ancient demon Lord Piccolo. With James Marsters.

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: (1994) Comedy starring Joe Mantegna, Joe Pantoliano and Brian Haley. Inept criminals kidnap a millionaire's baby. But when the boy escapes, there's mayhem as they try to track him down.

programme.title: Fatherhood
programme.desc: (2021) Heartfelt fact-based comedy-drama. Kevin Hart stars as a widower who is suddenly sprung into single fatherhood after his wife dies a day after giving birth.

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: (2016) Sci-fi blockbuster sequel starring Jeff Goldblum. Twenty years after Earth repelled a devastating alien invasion, the extraterrestrials return to finish the job.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
programme.desc: (2018) Tom Cruise stars in part six of the action-thriller series. His mission: to stop terrorists from getting their hands on nuclear bombs and unleashing global devastation.

programme.title: Scarface
programme.desc: (1983) Al Pacino stars in Brian De Palma's classic crime thriller. A Cuban immigrant uses the coaine trade to take what he wants of the American dream. Say hello to my little friend.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Muppets from Space
programme.desc: (1999) The Muppets are back in another feature-length adventure as Gonzo, convinced that he is of alien origin, struggles to communicate with his family in outer space.

programme.title: The Seeker: The Dark Is Rising
programme.desc: (2007) Supernatural thriller. Alexander Ludwig stars as The Seeker, who has the task of finding six items hidden throughout time, which the scary forces of The Dark are also looking for.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
programme.desc: (2018) Oscar-winning animated superhero adventure with the voices of Shameik Moore, Kathryn Hahn and Nicolas Cage. Can a gang of Spider-heroes save the universe from reality-bending chaos?

programme.title: Tooth Fairy
programme.desc: (2010) Family fantasy comedy. Dwayne Johnson stars as a tough ice hockey player who is transformed into a real-life fairy as punishment for telling a child that tooth fairies don't exist.

programme.title: Dog
programme.desc: (2022) Poignant road-trip comedy with Channing Tatum. A soldier with PTSD must escort a traumatised army canine to a comrade's funeral. Can man and dog save each other's lives?

programme.title: BattleBots
programme.desc: What the Flip?!: US robot combat series. The temperature is rising as fan favourites return to the BattleBox and Golden Bolt winner End Game takes on Blip in the Main Event. S7 Ep3

programme.title: Kojak
programme.desc: The Chinatown Murders - Part Two: Detective drama. Chinese gangsters kidnap an ailing Italian mobster after being ignored by the city's other crime syndicates and demand a ransom. S2 Ep2

programme.title: Kojak
programme.desc: Hush Now, or You'll Die: Detective drama. When Theo investigates a rape committed by two men - one of whom later kills the other - the victim's father seeks justice by any means. S2 Ep3

programme.title: Magnum, P.I.
programme.desc: All for One - Part Two: The concluding part of a two-part episode of the classic US action drama series. Rick falls for a Vietnamese girl and considers taking her back to America. S5 Ep12

programme.title: Magnum, P.I.
programme.desc: The Love-For-Sale Boat: Classic US action drama series. Thomas tangles with Yakuza hitmen while trying to find a crook who sold a boat stolen from a company in Long Beach to Rick. S5 Ep13

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: The Best Laid Schemes: Classic detective series. When a woman is tormented by calls from her supposedly deceased husband, The Saint believes that her spouse may still be alive. S5 Ep28

programme.title: The Chase Celebrity Special
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as Jon Sopel, Maisie Summers-Newton, Perri Shakes-Drayton and Brian Conley take on the challenge and hope to win thousands of pounds for their chosen charities. S13 Ep10

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: Dash for the Cash: Nail-biting documentary series. Experienced trucker Alex Debogorski is given the task of hauling a 44,000-pound diamond-ore crusher across 350 miles of ice. S1 Ep3

programme.title: The Enforcer
programme.desc: Action thriller film sequel starring Clint Eastwood and Tyne Daly, 1976. 'Dirty' Harry Callahan is pitted against a terrorist organisation made up of disgruntled Vietnam veterans.

programme.title: Dark Side of the Ring
programme.desc: Blood and Wire: Onita's FMW: Wrestling documentary series. Atsushi Onita creates FMW and some spectacular matches, but his successor takes his own life while drowning in debt. S3 Ep10

programme.title: The Best of the 70s
programme.desc: A look back at the wide variety of sports covered by ITV during the 1970s - from horse racing to table football and Formula One to darts - that includes many memorable moments.

programme.title: The Protectors
programme.desc: 2,000 Feet to Die: A friend of Harry's insists on doing a dangerous skydiving trick despite the fact that gold smugglers are trying to kill him. S1 Ep1

programme.title: Magnum, P.I.
programme.desc: Let Me Hear the Music: Classic US action drama series. When Thomas is hired to find the sheet music for five lost songs, he learns that their true authorship is very complicated. S5 Ep14

programme.title: Cadfael
programme.desc: The Devil's Novice: The adventures of a 12th-century sleuthing monk. Brother Cadfael and his colleagues welcome a young man with an urgent wish to join the order into the Abbey. S2 Ep2

programme.title: ITV Racing: The Opening Show
programme.desc: Rishi Persad and the team are at Ascot ahead of a top-class weekend of racing.

programme.title: The Big Match Revisited
programme.desc: It's FA Cup Third Round weekend in January 1976 as Brian Moore introduces highlights including Tottenham Hotspur entertaining Stoke City and Derby County taking on Everton. S9 Ep18

programme.title: Football Rivalries: Arsenal v Spurs
programme.desc: Clips from famous matches between Arsenal and Tottenham Hotspur.

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: A Double in Diamonds: More action and intrigue with troubleshooter Simon Templar. The Saint gets tangled up with a plot to steal a diamond necklace and the murder of a jeweller. S5 Ep24

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: The Power Artists: Troubleshooter Simon Templar embarks on another case. Chief Inspector Teal fights to clear The Saint's name when Simon is framed for the murder of a sculptor. S5 Ep25

programme.title: Extreme E Desert X Prix - The Final Lap
programme.desc: Day One: Coverage from the first day of the Final Lap of the Desert X Prix in Qiddiya City as Extreme E, the groundbreaking electric off-road series, takes its final bow.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: Ready to Roll: The first episode of the nail-biting documentary series set in remote Arctic territories. Construction crews begin the process of creating a 350-mile highway of ice. S1 Ep1

programme.title: River Monsters
programme.desc: Killer Catfish: Jeremy Wade is on the hunt for the notorious killer catfish to determine if their attacks are real and their methods are as gruesome as reported. S1 Ep5

programme.title: Sharpe
programme.desc: Sharpe's Eagle: Napoleonic War-based action-adventure. Wellesley orders Sharpe to ensure that an arranged mission involving an incompetent colonel's new regiment is a success. S1 Ep2

programme.title: Sharpe
programme.desc: Sharpe's Company: Napoleonic War-based action-adventure. Spain 1812 - Wellesley, who is now the Duke of Wellington, sets his sights on Badajoz as Sharpe is reunited with Teresa. S2 Ep1

programme.title: Think Big
programme.desc: Children are the future -- and so are their inventions, which is why "Think Big" could be an important show. It features young inventors competing to see who can come up with the most-innovative invention. Each episode features two teams in the Think Tank -- a studio filled with art supplies and construction materials -- who brainstorm and choose materials before sketching, designing and building a prototype to be presented to a judge, who determines a winner. The champions earn bragging rights and the coveted Genius Cup.

programme.title: Biz Kids

programme.title: America's Heartland
programme.desc: Much of the food Americans eat is produced by farmers and ranchers in the country's heartland, but many people don't know how it's produced. "America's Heartland" provides information about the people and processes responsible for the availability of food and fuel across the country and around the world. The show's reporters and producers tell stories in topics that include farm families, consumer issues, animal welfare and crop sustainability. Some episodes also take the show abroad to countries such as Egypt and Taiwan to show the impact American agriculture has on the global economy.

programme.title: Cattle Queen of Montana
programme.desc: When defiant female rancher Sierra Nevada Jones (Barbara Stanwyck) sweeps into Montana, she receives a hostile welcome from a tribe of Native Americans who attack her cattle and leave her father dead. Kindly Indian brave Colorados (Lance Fuller) and government officer Farrell (Ronald Reagan) help Sierra fight for her land against treacherous locals like the envious Tom McCord (Gene Evans), a neighboring rancher determined to cheat Jones out of her property and drive her back to Texas.

programme.title: 2025 FIM Speedway Highlights
programme.desc: With four riders battling for 4 short laps per race, patience goes out the window and competitors are not afraid to get their elbows out, bang bars and throw aggressive passes for the win.

programme.title: King of the Roads
programme.desc: With riders racing through city streets on 200mph motorcycles with no margin for error, this series is the ultimate test for adrenaline junkies who are looking for the biggest thrill in motorsports.

programme.title: 2025 British Superbikes
programme.desc: Since 1988, this series has evolved into one of the world's premier domestic superbike series, with its claim to fame being international stars such as Troy Bayliss, Alex Lowes and Neil Hodgson.

programme.title: 2025 FIM Sidecarcross
programme.desc: The FIM Sidecarcross riders (a driver and a passenger) race on the same tracks as solo motocross but the handling of machines differs as sidecars don't lean. Skill meets speed, as they work together to navigate the courseand the fastest team wins.

programme.title: 2025 Isle of Man
programme.desc: Riders race through this legendary 37-mile course reaching speeds of over 200 miles per hour in a stunning display of skill and bravery in what has been deemed the most dangerous race in the world.

programme.title: 2025 Monster Jam Primetime
programme.desc: Ryan Anderson leads Son Uva Digger into a head-to-head matchup against Wildside's Zack Garner.

programme.title: Launch Control
programme.desc: Brandon Semenuk and Keaton Williams embark on a New Zealand adventure at Otago Rally, but the fun is tempered by news from back home. With the news still fresh in his mind, Semenuk launches into the next round of the American championship.

programme.title: Hot Rod History Lessons

programme.desc: Stacey digs into the Joe Dirt side of things and how an old, beat up Daytona made it cool to drive old, rusty junk! After that, he shows what it takes to make a high-end replica of a down-and-dirty car.

programme.desc: Sam adds some Lokar Performance flair to the '66 Mustang.

This show has something for everyone. From daily-drivers to Dusenberg's - from local cruise-ins to the most prestigious car shows in the world, this program covers it all!

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E17 Hero While hunting, Colly Vane encounters a dangerous outlaw, The Domino Kid, who forces Vane to shoot him. When he brings the body back to town, it's discovered he was shot in the back. Instead of being a hero, Vane faces danger.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E18 The Horse Traders Kansas Sawyer is Lucas' friend who was cheated in a horse-trading deal. Lucas investigates Colonel Bourbon's operation and discovers his illegal process. He also learns that the horse Sawyer bought was stolen and is being sought after by outlaws.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S5 E8 Kiddie Corral The cowboys step a little outside of their comfort zones. Looking to offload their new herd, the guys head down to the local stockyard to hone their bartering skills. Cody bounces a crazy rodeo idea off the boys - then uses them guinea pigs. Bubba plans a short getaway with Kaley, but there's a big catch: Booger's been tapped as the babysitter, with Jaclyn lending a helping hand. Kaley wonders if Booger is up to the challenge. His first attempts to feed and dress little Andie suggest he most certainly is not! While Bubba and Kaley aren't sure they'll return home to find everything in one piece, they do get some great news from houseguest Andrew. Cody is desperate to find the final missing piece for his rodeo: an announcer. While Booger adamant that he's the perfect man for the job, Cody has to resort to using reverse psychology on his old friend to avoid disaster.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S5 E9 Ride 'Em High Will all the hard work the cowboys put in this season finally pay off? Cody is hoping the people of Bay Minette will come out in droves to make his rodeo a rousing success, while Misty puts on her game face to take another shot at barrel-racing glory. Andrew's bags are finally packed and he's clearing out. Though Bubba and Kaley hate to see him go, they also love watching him leave! Since the cowboys have been buying cattle left and right, word's gotten out about the Faith Cattle Company's trading business. This leads to Booger and Bubba boarding a private jet to meet some Texas investors looking to place a make-or-break order. As the guys hustle to gather all the cattle in time, they find themselves bidding against an old friend at the sale barn. Rodeo night brings all the families together - and even Andrew makes a surprise appearance. As the season draws to a close, the cowboys have everything on the line: their own money, as well as their reputations.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E33 The Money Gun Lucas has a disdain for Oat Jackford since years ago he burned down his ranch to get him off property he wanted. When hired killer Tom King arrives in North Fork and is on Oat's trail, Lucas decides to side with and help the man he once hated.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E34 A Matter of Faith A trail bum rides into North Fork during one of the worst droughts in years. He claims that he can bring rain to their town. Many believe that he's a water witcher, but a railroad boss resents his intrusion and wants him gone.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E1 They Killed Me Frontiersman Jim Bridger spins an incredible tale to a group of settlers, claiming he was once killed by Blackfeet warriors yet somehow lived to tell the tale. They think he's joking, but Bridger soon proves that he really did rise from the dead.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E4 Brothers in Arms When they are ambushed by a Blackfeet war party, Jim Bridger and a lone Shoshone brave must work together to find a way to defeat their common enemy. If they can't overcome their suspicions and learn to trust each other, they may not survive the day.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E4 Burton Mossman Crosses the Line After failing to capture the ruthless murderer Augustine Chacon on U.S. soil, Arizona Ranger Burton Mossman relinquishes his badge to cross the border. In Mexico, he goes undercover as a horse thief to join Chacon's gang and spring his trap.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E6 Sister Blandina and the Killer When a bloodthirsty mob storms a jailhouse holding a man accused of attempted murder, they are confronted by a 22-year-old missionary from the Sisters of Charity. Only Sister Blandina can stop the vigilantes from taking the law into their own hands.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E7 Daniel Boone: Hero of Kentucky After frontiersman Daniel Boone forges paths across the Appalachian Mountains and into the newly discovered lands of Kentucky, he founds the settlement of Boonesborough, which quickly becomes one of the most important outposts on colonial America's frontier. But this westward expansion comes at a price. Despite agreements made with the powerful Cherokee nation, conflict between the settlers and natives soon rages like wildfire. For Boone, the strife becomes intensely personal when his daughter and two other young women are abducted by Hanging Maw, a fearsome Cherokee chief. In a desperate chase, Boone pursues Hanging Maw's warriors and their captives through untamed wilderness, with his daughter's life hanging in the balance.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Nels Stack Story Nels Stack, a war veteran, joins the wagon train. He is now a pacifist who defends against any prejudice. Stack's mild manner leads others to label him a coward. But the tides turn when his kindness gets the train out of dangerous Indian territory.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E7 A Good Day to Die The Kid finds a young Indian warrior at the scene of a massacre and takes him into custody to face justice in Sweetwater. The warrior, named Curly, denies any wrongdoing. The Kid and the riders try to determine if he is responsible for the crime.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E2 The Conspirators Cheyenne travels to Washington, DC, to work on a special undercover assignment for the Army. He poses as a traveling stage actor named Jim Merritt in order to stop the Confederate Army's reorganization.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E8 The Storm Riders The hired hand of a wealthy landowner ambushes and injures Cheyenne while he drives a herd of horses for a local rancher, on what he thought was open territory. As his boss nurses him back to health, Cheyenne gets more than he bargained for.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E15 A Case of Identity Aaron Wingate lost his wife and son in a river boat fire years ago. The boy was never found. Wingate hires two private detectives who come to North Fork and decide that Mark will fit the bill. Lucas must fight for custody.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E16 The Visitor A pretty young widow named Ann Dodd passes through North Fork on her way to claim her inheritance. She and Lucas are immediately attracted to each other, but danger awaits as other heirs try to take Ann's life to get the inheritance for themselves.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E17 Hero While hunting, Colly Vane encounters a dangerous outlaw, The Domino Kid, who forces Vane to shoot him. When he brings the body back to town, it's discovered he was shot in the back. Instead of being a hero, Vane faces danger.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E18 The Horse Traders Kansas Sawyer is Lucas' friend who was cheated in a horse-trading deal. Lucas investigates Colonel Bourbon's operation and discovers his illegal process. He also learns that the horse Sawyer bought was stolen and is being sought after by outlaws.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E1 Drone'T Knock It 'Til You Try It A ranching job in Texas inspires Cody to try and modernize their business with the help of technology, but Booger and Bubba are hesitant that it will be successful. Booger visits Matthew's school during parent's week to teach his classmates about cowboying. Bubba struggles with being away from his family for work and feels the pressure to keep their business close to home. A life-changing opportunity for Booger to compete at a world-renowned colt-starting competition leaves Cody and Bubba excited for their friend, but nervous about what it will mean for their business.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E2 Obstacle Horse, of Course of Course With no plans on how to expand their business in sight, the cowboys head to Texas for work. After attending a special cattle sale for Misty's business, Full Moon Cattle, Cody comes up with a possible new business venture. Booger begins training for the Road to the Horse competition, but things don't go smoothly. Feeling like he's in over his head, he receives good advice from an unexpected source. A hand injury affects how much work Bubba can do, but he uses the downtime to build a mock obstacle course for Booger. Kaley tells Bubba about her desire to get into real estate and encourages him to think about a possible career change. Booger challenges Misty to compete against him in the obstacle course, and Jaclyn receives a crash course in barrel racing.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E35 Blood Brothers Lucas finds a wounded man, takes him to the North Fork doctor, and gives blood to help save the stranger's life. Marshal Torrance won't help as he says he knows the man and wants him dead. Things become more complicated when vigilantes ride to town.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E36 Stranger at Night Coming home from school, Mark stumbles upon a dead man's body. Lucas discovers he was stabbed and the only clue is a belt with the initials R.M. Lucas leaves Mark with Artemus Quarles, a cousin who is visiting. Quarles, however, is not who he seems.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Spirit of Truth After his fur trapping expedition is surprised by a Crow war party, legendary mountain man Jim Bridger suddenly finds himself in a desperate struggle to rescue his fellow trappers when one of them goes missing, and another is on the brink of madness.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Fossil Feud When bloodthirsty Canadian trappers try to kill him, mountain man Jim Bridger takes cover in an unexplored valley. There, he runs headlong into a family of escaped slaves who show him the huge footprints and fossilized bones of long-dead monsters.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E1 Bat Masterson to the Rescue Now without a badge, former lawman Bat Masterson finds himself powerless to help an old friend whose brother has been falsely imprisoned. An overreaching sheriff is intent on seeing the brother hang, so Bat hatches a plan to bust him out of jail.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E11 Al Jennings and the Legend of Dick West Tired of his boring life, attorney Al Jennings dreams of the adventures he reads in dime novels. After a chance encounter with Dick West, Jennings joins the outlaw's gang and learns that a life of crime isn't as glamorous as he thought it would be.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E4 Lewis & Clark: Captains of Discovery Under orders from President Jefferson to explore America's vast unknown frontier, Meriwether Lewis and William Clark lead an expedition up the Missouri River in an attempt to reach the Pacific Ocean...a journey no American has made before, and one that may not even be possible. Leaving Fort Mandan after their first winter on the frontier, the Corps of Discovery enters completely uncharted territory. But as the waterways they travel become too shallow for boats, Lewis and Clark desperately seek the Shoshone tribe and their horses. To communicate with the elusive tribe, they rely on Sacagawea, a 16-year-old Shoshone woman, who accompanies the expedition with her newborn son. Lewis and Clark hope Sacagawea will help them trade for the Shoshone's horses, which will provide the only means of crossing the forbidding Rocky Mountains before winter returns.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: S1 E1 The Annie MacGregor Story While on the trail, Annie MacGregor and her Scottish family's wagon wheel breaks. The family patriarch doesn't want any help until Major Adams' wagon train stops. Conflict arises when they practice their traditions, including playing bagpipes.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E8 End of Innocence Jimmy accompanies Emma to Fort Reunion to help a friend give birth. While there, they encounter the wicked commanding officer responsible for an Indian massacre at a peaceful village. Jimmy tries to find out the truth of what really happened.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E3 The Mutton Puncher An attractive businesswoman named Thora Flagg needs help to move her herd of sheep into town. However, cattle boss Ben Creed, who is Cheyenne's boss, stands in the way. During a poker game, Cheyenne finds himself caught in the middle.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E1 The Gunmen While in Texas, Joe and Hoss are mistaken for the Slade brothers who are involved in a feud between two families. In order to stop the fighting, they decide to turn to the women of the families for help.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E19 The Spoiler An elderly couple move to North Fork and settle down under a false name to keep the town from knowing they are parents of a vicious killer on the loose. However, their plan fails when their son shows up and causes chaos.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E20 Heller A teenage girl named Heller and her brother are abused by her drunken stepfather. The town becomes aware after Heller is caught stealing from the general store. The children plan the drunk's demise as the cruelty continues. Lucas steps in to help.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E21 The Grasshopper When Lucas and Mark go on a train trip, clouds of swarming grasshoppers force the train to stop. A prisoner takes advantage of the emergency and breaks free, then kills Marshal Dixon. Lucas, with the help of a buffalo hunter, outwits the outlaw.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E22 A Time for Singing Outlaws kill a preacher and his wife. Two members of the group assume their identity and come to North Fork to rob the bank. However, when Mark finds out who they really are, he is kidnapped and kept quiet. Lucas and Micah set out to stop the gang.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E1 Drone'T Knock It 'Til You Try It A ranching job in Texas inspires Cody to try and modernize their business with the help of technology, but Booger and Bubba are hesitant that it will be successful. programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E19 The Spoiler An elderly couple move to North Fork and settle down under a false name to keep the town from knowing they are parents of a vicious killer on the loose. However, their plan fails when their son shows up and causes chaos.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E20 Heller A teenage girl named Heller and her brother are abused by her drunken stepfather. The town becomes aware after Heller is caught stealing from the general store. The children plan the drunk's demise as the cruelty continues. Lucas steps in to help.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E21 The Grasshopper When Lucas and Mark go on a train trip, clouds of swarming grasshoppers force the train to stop. A prisoner takes advantage of the emergency and breaks free, then kills Marshal Dixon. Lucas, with the help of a buffalo hunter, outwits the outlaw.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E22 A Time for Singing Outlaws kill a preacher and his wife. Two members of the group assume their identity and come to North Fork to rob the bank. However, when Mark finds out who they really are, he is kidnapped and kept quiet. Lucas and Micah set out to stop the gang.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E3 Unsaddled and Unraveled Booger heads to Austin to work with a former contestant in preparation for the Road to the Horse competition. He quickly realizes that there's more to this competition than handling a colt, and presentation has a lot to do with his score. Cody finds the perfect herd to start a special cattle sale and shares his idea for the business with Bubba, but he is hesitant. Once Booger is back, the cowboys meet to discuss the future of their business, but they don't all see eye-to-eye. Cody and Bubba want to be supportive of Booger but are frustrated that his dedication to the Road to the Horse competition has taken priority over their business. The lack of direction causes tension between the cowboys. Feeling divided, they all start to question the future of their business.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E4 Buckskin for the Win! The cowboys are unable to decide on exactly how they want to move their business forward. In the meantime, they continue to take day jobs to stay afloat. With Cody still fixated on the specialty cattle sale, Misty encourages him to do it on his own, without the help of Bubba and Booger. A new opportunity falls in Bubba's lap to operate a ranch for a group of organic feed investors. While it seems to be a dream role for Bubba, he struggles with the fact that it would require him to move his family north and away from the other cowboys. After much anticipation and practice, Booger heads to Kentucky for the Road to the Horse competition, where he faces the challenge of managing an unruly horse.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E37 The Raid A renegade Apache named Chaqua raids the McCain Ranch and kidnaps Mark. Lucas gathers a group of men to get Mark back, but Chaqua plans to make him an Apache warrior since he lost his own son. Lucas will stop at nothing to get his son back to safety.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E1 Outlaw's Inheritance The townspeople of North Fork begin to get suspicious when Lucas is named as the beneficiary in the will of an infamous outlaw.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E6 Fool's Gold After discovering a river filled with gold, Jim Bridger and his fellow trappers believe they are near El Dorado, the mythical Spanish city of gold. But their insatiable greed turns friends into enemies and puts Bridger at risk of a gruesome fate.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E5 A Prince on the Prairie While guiding a hunting expedition, Jim Bridger must deal with an arrogant foreign prince who is abusing his servant boy. But the tables soon turn, when it's the prince who needs rescuing, and his only hope is the long-suffering servant boy.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E9 The Trials of Temple Houston Temple Houston, flamboyant son of Sam Houston, works hard to live up to his famous name as a top attorney in the Oklahoma Territory. But his flair for showmanship annoys his courtroom rivals, the Jennings brothers, and the feud erupts into bloodshed.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E12 Annie Oakley & Buffalo Bill's Wild West Showdown When Buffalo Bill adds female sharpshooter Lillian Smith to his Wild West show, it jeopardizes his relationship with the show's current star, Annie Oakley. As the rivalry between Annie and Lillian escalates, the future of the show is put at risk.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E1 John Colter: King of the Mountain Men As a member of Lewis and Clark's Corps of Discovery, John Colter travels from the Missouri River all the way to the Pacific Ocean, but he decides not to return to the civilized East when the expedition ends. Entranced by the beauty and adventure of the wild frontier, he becomes one of America's first mountain men. As a hunter, trapper and explorer in his own right, he's the first American to see the Grand Tetons and the epic Yellowstone Valley. While his epic explorations make him famous, it's a harrowing ordeal with Blackfeet warriors that makes him a legend. After boldly venturing into territory controlled by the Blackfeet tribe, Colter is captured, stripped naked, and forced to run for his life as warriors give chase in what will come to be known as Colter's Run.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: S2 E1 The Flint McCullough Story Flint returns home to Fort Bridger to visit the man who raised him. A run-in with an enemy brings back painful memories of his time in the Confederate Army and the tragedy that ensued after falling in love with Jean Yates, a young Mormon.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E9 Blind Love Jimmy falls in love with a young woman, not realizing that she is married. He finds himself framed for a murder by the woman. The Kid and Lou come to Jimmy's aid, proving that he is innocent of the crime.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E4 Border Affair During the French occupation in Mexico, Cheyenne meets a beautiful princess who is engaged to marry an older French officer. He takes her to a rebel camp, where he learns her true identity.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Fear Merchants The Cartwrights help a Chinese-American stable hand who finds himself accused of murder. Opposing them is a manipulative mayoral candidate, Andrew Fulmer, a bigoted man who wants all foreigners to leave Virginia City.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E23 The Deserter A wounded Army deserter shows up at the McCain Ranch desperate for a horse. Lucas takes him in just as the Army Cavalry unit appears to take the deserter into custody. In town, the harsh commanding officer demands he be executed for desertion.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E24 The Vision Mark drinks some tainted water from a barrel and contracts typhoid fever. Lucas is forced to use an eccentric old doctor. During bouts of a continuous intense fever, Mark becomes delirious and has a vision of his deceased mother, who he never knew.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E25 The Lariat Lariat Jones, an old friend of Lucas', comes to North Fork to open up a new gambling casino. Jones has an excellent reputation as an honest gambler. But when two strangers become his partners, accusations of cheating become deadly for Jones.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E26 Smoke Screen A beautiful headstrong young woman named Marge Crandell doesn't like to be told what to do by anyone. Several men vie for her attention and when Lucas finds her dead, one of the men becomes a prime suspect due to a simple clue, a half-smoked cigar.
