programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E25 The Lariat Lariat Jones, an old friend of Lucas', comes to North Fork to open up a new gambling casino. Jones has an excellent reputation as an honest gambler. But when two strangers become his partners, accusations of cheating become deadly for Jones.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E26 Smoke Screen A beautiful headstrong young woman named Marge Crandell doesn't like to be told what to do by anyone. Several men vie for her attention and when Lucas finds her dead, one of the men becomes a prime suspect due to a simple clue, a half-smoked cigar.

programme.title: The Legend of 5 Mile Cave
programme.desc: A boy enchanted with tales from the Old West unlocks a mystery that could save their family farm. While his widowed mother struggles to avoid foreclosure, a mysterious stranger arrives looking for a room to rent. A bond with the boy grows as the drifter recounts breathtaking stories of Shooter Green, a legendary gunslinger accused of Arizona's biggest gold robbery. The truth is revealed, along with the secret of the drifter's past when a crooked lawman appears, hot on the trail of the stolen gold. Past and present collide in this tale of action, adventure and drama. Stars Adam Baldwin (The Last Ship, Full Metal Jacket, The Patriot), Jeremy Sumpter (Peter Pan, Soul Surfer), Jill Wagner (Braven, Christmas Cookies), and Jet Jurgensmeyer (Last Man Standing, American Sniper).

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E38 Boomerang Sam Elder unexpectedly dies after the bank forecloses on his ranch Lucas takes in his son, who is now orphaned. Lucas teaches the boy how to use a gun, but Lucas doesn't know the boy plans to get revenge on the banker.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E39 The Mind Reader Rancher John Hallager is shot and killed in North Fork and young Billy Mathis is a prime suspect. Billy was seeing Hallager's daughter but was told to stay away. Lucas believes in Billy's innocence, and a clue may help.

programme.title: Buffalo Keepers
programme.desc: S1 E1 Today, the buffalo is the quintessential symbol of strength, freedom, and the unspoiled American West. But in the late 1800s, the nation's buffalo were nearly wiped out by ruthless hide hunters. Those majestic herds, which once numbered in the tens of millions, were down to less than 500 animals. This is the story of the handful of determined men and women who mobilized to save the ones that were left in a last-ditch effort to stave off extinction. Ranchers like Charles and Mary Ann Goodnight rescued orphaned buffalo calves and built small herds. Former buffalo hunters like Buffalo Bill helped build public sympathy. And politicians like Theodore Roosevelt helped pass laws to protect the remaining animals. The effort would be a generational one, with buffalo herds carefully tended, bred, and passed down to new stewards when their old protectors passed away. Thanks to their efforts, there are an estimated 500,000 buffalo thundering across America's grasslands once again.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E1 Bat Masterson Leaves the West After leaving Dodge City, Bat Masterson takes a job as manager of Denver's Palace Theatre. There he falls in love with Emma Walter, a jugging virtuoso known as the Queen of Clubs, and begins to question his life as a gunslinger.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E6 Black Bart's Revenge Wells Fargo detective James Hume hires private investigator Harry Morse to join the hunt for Black Bart. Known as the Poet Highwayman, Bart leaves tantalizing poems at the scenes of his crimes, which may be the key to unmasking Bart's true identity.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E2 Jim Bridger: Forged on the Frontier With dreams of fortune and adventure, an 18-year-old Jim Bridger joins William Ashley's expedition to trap beaver along the Missouri River. But a grim ordeal soon forces Bridger to weigh his morals against the harsh reality of survival in the wild. A vicious grizzly bear attack leaves fellow trapper and hunter Hugh Glass on the verge of death and completely dependent upon Bridger's care. As a hostile band of Arikara warriors begins to close in, Bridger must choose between staying with the dying man and risking certain death, or leaving his injured comrade alone in the woods and fleeing to safety. In what becomes a legendary tale of the wild frontier, Bridger wrestles to choose between right and wrong, knowing the harsh retribution that will follow if he makes the wrong choice.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: S3 E1 The Malachi Hobart Story Duke scouts a new passage through rough terrain. He meets a traveling preacher named Malachi Hobart during his trip. However, he soon discovers that Hobart is nothing more than a con man. Duke devises a plan to expose him.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E9 The Prizefighter When Jim Bridger's second-in-command begins enforcing camp discipline with brutal violence, one trapper pushes back, and a showdown seems inevitable. Can Bridger intervene before the situation turns from mutual hostility into cold-blooded murder?

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E10 A Shard of Glass Haunted by the memory of leaving a man to die, mountain man Jim Bridger is determined not to repeat the mistake. When his trapping party runs out of water while crossing a barren desert, Bridger struggles desperately to keep his companions alive.

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: It's the late 1800s and a marshal must stop a volatile and growing conflict between homesteaders and cattle drivers in his small town on the Kansas frontier.

programme.title: Concrete Cowboys
programme.desc: When two lively cowboys from Montana are set up by a crooked sheriff, they wind up on the run. After arriving in Nashville, the two open a detective agency together and are soon hired to prevent the kidnapping of a country singer.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E22 Closer Than a Brother Marshal Micah Torrance loses his confidence in his job of authority and begins drinking again after an old enemy from the past terrorizes him. When Lucas learns of the situation, he invites the man to North Fork and convinces Micah to face his fears.

programme.title: The Legend of 5 Mile Cave
programme.desc: A boy enchanted with tales from the Old West unlocks a mystery that could save their family farm. While his widowed mother struggles to avoid foreclosure, a mysterious stranger arrives looking for a room to rent. A bond with the boy grows as the drifter recounts breathtaking stories of Shooter Green, a legendary gunslinger accused of Arizona's biggest gold robbery. The truth is revealed, along with the secret of the drifter's past when a crooked lawman appears, hot on the trail of the stolen gold. Past and present collide in this tale of action, adventure and drama. Stars Adam Baldwin (The Last Ship, Full Metal Jacket, The Patriot), Jeremy Sumpter (Peter Pan, Soul Surfer), Jill Wagner (Braven, Christmas Cookies), and Jet Jurgensmeyer (Last Man Standing, American Sniper).

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E38 Boomerang Sam Elder unexpectedly dies after the bank forecloses on his ranch Lucas takes in his son, who is now orphaned. Lucas teaches the boy how to use a gun, but Lucas doesn't know the boy plans to get revenge on the banker.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E39 The Mind Reader Rancher John Hallager is shot and killed in North Fork and young Billy Mathis is a prime suspect. Billy was seeing Hallager's daughter but was told to stay away. Lucas believes in Billy's innocence, and a clue may help.

programme.title: Buffalo Keepers
programme.desc: S1 E1 Today, the buffalo is the quintessential symbol of strength, freedom, and the unspoiled American West. But in the late 1800s, the nation's buffalo were nearly wiped out by ruthless hide hunters. Those majestic herds, which once numbered in the tens of millions, were down to less than 500 animals. This is the story of the handful of determined men and women who mobilized to save the ones that were left in a last-ditch effort to stave off extinction. Ranchers like Charles and Mary Ann Goodnight rescued orphaned buffalo calves and built small herds. Former buffalo hunters like Buffalo Bill helped build public sympathy. And politicians like Theodore Roosevelt helped pass laws to protect the remaining animals. The effort would be a generational one, with buffalo herds carefully tended, bred, and passed down to new stewards when their old protectors passed away. Thanks to their efforts, there are an estimated 500,000 buffalo thundering across America's grasslands once again.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E1 Bat Masterson Leaves the West After leaving Dodge City, Bat Masterson takes a job as manager of Denver's Palace Theatre. There he falls in love with Emma Walter, a jugging virtuoso known as the Queen of Clubs, and begins to question his life as a gunslinger.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E6 Black Bart's Revenge Wells Fargo detective James Hume hires private investigator Harry Morse to join the hunt for Black Bart. Known as the Poet Highwayman, Bart leaves tantalizing poems at the scenes of his crimes, which may be the key to unmasking Bart's true identity.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E2 Jim Bridger: Forged on the Frontier With dreams of fortune and adventure, an 18-year-old Jim Bridger joins William Ashley's expedition to trap beaver along the Missouri River. But a grim ordeal soon forces Bridger to weigh his morals against the harsh reality of survival in the wild. A vicious grizzly bear attack leaves fellow trapper and hunter Hugh Glass on the verge of death and completely dependent upon Bridger's care. As a hostile band of Arikara warriors begins to close in, Bridger must choose between staying with the dying man and risking certain death, or leaving his injured comrade alone in the woods and fleeing to safety. In what becomes a legendary tale of the wild frontier, Bridger wrestles to choose between right and wrong, knowing the harsh retribution that will follow if he makes the wrong choice.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: S3 E1 The Malachi Hobart Story Duke scouts a new passage through rough terrain. He meets a traveling preacher named Malachi Hobart during his trip. However, he soon discovers that Hobart is nothing more than a con man. Duke devises a plan to expose him.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E9 The Prizefighter When Jim Bridger's second-in-command begins enforcing camp discipline with brutal violence, one trapper pushes back, and a showdown seems inevitable. Can Bridger intervene before the situation turns from mutual hostility into cold-blooded murder?

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E10 A Shard of Glass Haunted by the memory of leaving a man to die, mountain man Jim Bridger is determined not to repeat the mistake. When his trapping party runs out of water while crossing a barren desert, Bridger struggles desperately to keep his companions alive.

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: It's the late 1800s and a marshal must stop a volatile and growing conflict between homesteaders and cattle drivers in his small town on the Kansas frontier.

programme.title: Concrete Cowboys
programme.desc: When two lively cowboys from Montana are set up by a crooked sheriff, they wind up on the run. After arriving in Nashville, the two open a detective agency together and are soon hired to prevent the kidnapping of a country singer.

programme.title: Rio Diablo
programme.desc: When a just-married couple is caught in the middle of a bank robbery, the bride is taken by the robbers. Now, the groom and a skilled bounty hunter search for the gang, hoping to find the bride alive.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E1 The Gunmen While in Texas, Joe and Hoss are mistaken for the Slade brothers who are involved in a feud between two families. In order to stop the fighting, they decide to turn to the women of the families for help.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Fear Merchants The Cartwrights help a Chinese-American stable hand who finds himself accused of murder. Opposing them is a manipulative mayoral candidate, Andrew Fulmer, a bigoted man who wants all foreigners to leave Virginia City.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E5 Kit Carson: The Greatest Scout in the West As a fur trapper, hunter, scout, and explorer, Kit Carson is an irresistible subject for reporters and novelists, and his incredible adventures make him a mythic figure in his own lifetime. Yet fame is the last thing on Carson's mind in 1849. All he wants to do is settle down to a quiet life with his wife on the family ranch, but once again fate comes calling. When settler Ann White is captured by an Apache raiding party, the Army seeks out Carson to help track the warriors and rescue Mrs. White, whose husband was killed in the raid. Although known to be the best tracker in the history of the Western Frontier, Carson admits this is the most difficult trail he has ever followed. He leads the military on a desperate chase, tracking the Apache through 200 miles of treacherous western wilderness. When they finally catch up with the Apache, the aftermath leaves Carson haunted for the rest of his days.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E15 Charles M. Russell: The Cowboy Artist Charlie Russell is an aimless cowhand who loves the freedom of the cowboy way of life, and he is a self-taught artist who enjoys capturing the scenes of his rugged work on the range. Too embarrassed to ask people to pay for his paintings, he gives most of them away to friends or trades them for drinks at the saloon. But that changes quickly after he falls in love. Charlie's new bride Nancy gives him the encouragement he needs to stop cowboying in order to focus on his artwork. Under her watchful eye, he sobers up, stops cowboying, and improves his mastery of painting. Nancy is so proud of Charlie's talent that she doesn't hesitate to ask top dollar for his paintings. Years later, when legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson tries to do a piece on Charlie, he quickly realizes that he must first deal with the woman behind the famous cowboy artist Charles M. Russell.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E4 The Legend of Nat Love When Black cowboy Nat Love overnights in Deadwood during a cattle drive, he decides to enter a Fourth of July cowboy competition. Confident in his roping, riding, and shooting skills, he is eager to test his mettle against the best cowboys around.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S6 E10 The Wedding Rings After a stray bullet kills a young boy's father, Cheyenne befriends Pepe and takes him to his mother in Mexico. They meet Pepe's grandfather, a rising dictator of a province who's demanding tax payments in the form of wedding rings from villagers.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: S5 E1 Alias Bill Hawks Bill Hawks rides into a prairie town looking for his old Indian friend, but soon realizes he is not welcome. He discovers that the townspeople are drilling a well on his friend's land and won't give him any information on his whereabouts.

programme.title: Vengeance Valley
programme.desc: A Colorado rancher contends with his two sons, one biological and the other adopted, who are fighting over control of the massive family property. Which brother will come out on top in this family battle for cash and cattle?

programme.title: The Quick and the Dead
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger crosses paths with a frontier family traveling to the Wyoming Territory. He becomes the family's defender against a ruthless gang bent on taking all they have and robbing them of their dreams, lives, and futures.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E25 The Prisoner When two ex-Confederate officers come to town, trouble ensues for Lucas as he was a lieutenant in the 8th Indiana which defeated the 12th Cavalry 15 years ago. The beaten men were sent to a Union prison camp and now want revenge on Lucas.

programme.title: Rage at Dawn
programme.desc: In 1866, the Reno Brothers gang is ravaging Indiana. When a detective agency sends a man to infiltrate the gang by posing as an outlaw, he sets a trap to capture the gang during an early-morning train robbery.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E11 The Apprentice Sheriff Dan Willard fills in as deputy while Marshal Micah Torrance is away on business. Meanwhile, Texas cowhands come to town looking for fun and relaxation. When Dan tries to prove that his toughness, those actions backfire.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E12 The Angry Gun Lucas and Mark, returning after selling their herd, share the stagecoach trip with a marshal and his prisoner, Johnny Cotton. Johnny's gang stops and robs the stagecoach, while Johnny steals Lucas' gun and profits. Lucas is forced to track him down.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E3 Bronco Bill's Treasure When Bronco Bill and his gang are robbing trains at will, two veteran lawmen join forces to stop the violent outlaws once and for all. Years later, gunfighter-turned-reporter Bat Masterson hears the story from the last surviving member of the gang.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E4 Ada Curnutt, U.S. Deputy Marshal After being sworn in as one of Oklahoma's first female deputy marshals, Ada Curnutt volunteers to track down two killers-turned-counterfeiters and concocts a cunning plan to bring them to justice without using a gun.

programme.title: Wagon Train

programme.desc: Mark's finding of the body of a murder victim starts Lucas, his friend Artemus and Marshal Torrance on a search for the killer.

programme.title: The High Chaparral
programme.desc: Victoria's idea that John buy a squatter's last turkey leads to complications involving a local Indian chief.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: Trouble strikes the wagon train when Coop is wounded, Hawks falls ill and a band of hostile Indians prepares to attack.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: A little girl's cries are heard during the night, but Charlie is the only one to catch a glimpse of her before she vanishes.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A band of Indians kidnaps Mark and disappears into the hills.

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.desc: Three convicts frame John for the murder of a Mexican shepherd's daughter and will kill him unless a ransom is paid.

programme.desc: Flint finds the ruins of a farmhouse which was attacked by Indians using guns, not arrows; he later finds the gunrunner who supplied them.

programme.title: Hellfighters
programme.desc: Chance Buckman (John Wayne) has one of the most dangerous jobs in the world. He, his assistant Greg (Jim Hutton) and his team of skilled firefighters extinguish raging oil field fires all over the world, cheating death every time. Madelyn (Vera Miles), his wife, is tired of worrying about Chance every time he leaves, and their marriage is beginning to fall apart. As Chance falls for Greg's daughter, Tish (Katharine Ross), he must battle both the flames in the field and the ones in his heart.

programme.title: Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: The epic biography of western lawman Wyatt Earp, who at an early age, is taught that nothing matters more than family and the law. He becomes a respected sheriff in Dodge City and Tombstone. Joined by his brothers and Doc Holliday, Earp wages war on the dreaded Clanton and McLaury gangs.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt brings three men suspected of an attack on an Indian woman back to Dodge to be identified.

programme.desc: A former sea captain (Gregory Peck) goes West, woos women (Jean Simmons, Carroll Baker) and joins a fight over water rights.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt tries to prevent a man from killing after his brother marries his beloved.

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: A Double in Diamonds: More action and intrigue with troubleshooter Simon Templar. The Saint gets tangled up with a plot to steal a diamond necklace and the murder of a jeweller. S5 Ep24

programme.title: Kojak
programme.desc: Dead on His Feet: Detective drama. When a terminally ill cop vows to avenge his partner's murder in the time he has left, Theo fears that his obsession could undermine a case. S1 Ep18

programme.title: Kojak
programme.desc: Down a Long and Lonely River: Detective drama. A psychologist asks Theo to find her fiance who has gone missing while on parole and may be planning to settle an old score. S1 Ep19

programme.title: Magnum, P.I.
programme.desc: Luther Gillis: File 001: Classic US action drama series. Straight-talking private eye Luther Gillis returns to Hawaii, where he sets about investigating a case on behalf of Higgins. S5 Ep6

programme.title: Magnum, P.I.
programme.desc: Kiss of the Sabre: Classic US action drama series. A friend of Robin's - who also happens to be an aspiring writer - comes to stay in the guest house to focus on her new novel. S5 Ep7

programme.title: Robin of Sherwood
programme.desc: The Cross of Saint Ciricus: Adventure-drama series based on the popular legend. Much and Scarlet take rest and sustenance in a rather unusual camp that causes them great concern. S3 Ep6

programme.title: BattleBots
programme.desc: Robots, Ready!!!: US robot combat series. The seventh series' World Championship qualifiers kick off with an epic fight card including fancied contenders like Witch Doctor. S7 Ep1

programme.title: Kojak
programme.desc: Mojo: Detective drama. Theo goes undercover as a chemist to catch a gang who stole a shipment of morphine from a pharmaceutical company, but an overdose complicates matters. S1 Ep20

programme.title: Kojak
programme.desc: Therapy in Dynamite: Detective drama. A series of seemingly unconnected bombings are the work of a man in a therapy group who is trying to eliminate people for his fellow patients. S1 Ep21

programme.title: Magnum, P.I.
programme.desc: Little Games: Classic US action drama series. Thomas falls for an attractive security expert hired to help protect Robin's Nest during a jewellery exhibit worth millions of dollars. S5 Ep8

programme.title: Magnum, P.I.
programme.desc: Professor Jonathan Higgins: Classic US action drama series. Agatha hires Thomas to find out who took money from her ladies' club, and Higgins tries to refine a distant cousin of his. S5 Ep9

programme.title: The Saint
